p: Here, Δ G MM is the molecular mechanics interaction (sum of electrostatic and van der Waals interaction), Δ G PB and Δ G SA correspond to polar and nonpolar solvation energyies, respectively. TΔS is the entropic contribution. Due to the high computational time, the entropy contribution was not considered. The final 50 ns data of MD simulation was used for binding free energy calculations.
